column2: in the event you care about the steak at a steak place and not just the drinks and comfort like I do.....the food was almost all very good.  I tried some of the smoked trout caesar salad and it was very good.  I love caesar salads and this one might be at the top of my list now.  The salmon was also very good
column3: cooked perfectly and seasoned just right.  We had some oysters that were also yummy.  The steak however was not cooked as ordered
column4: which is a problem if you wanna call yourself a steak place.  This should be the thing you definitely get right.  I had some of the elotes too and while they were good
column5: they didn't remind me of elotes much.
